long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Need to listen to printed text spoken aloud - at school, in a test or exam, at work or at home? Use Claro Scan Pen to photo your printed text document, letter, test paper - then select the text with your finger or (stylus), and hear it spoken straight back to you. Instantly!

Claro ScanPen advances read aloud support. It gives access to printed text materials, exam papers and documents for all, in a wide range of languages. Using your Chromebook Tablet, simply:

• Highlight with your finger or stylus which section of text you want to hear spoken to you.
• Listen as Claro Scan Pen instantly reads the text back to you using a human quality voice in a language of your choice.
